Title: Chapter XXII: Black Wind Howls
Writer: Alfred Gough (created by), Miles Millar (created by), Evan Endicott, Josh Stoddard
Actors: Daniel Wu, Emily Beecham, Aramis Knight, Orla Brady
Plot: Sunny and Bajie call in a favor from Bajie's past; The Widow interrogates an important captive who threatens her tentative peace with Pilgrim.
